title: The rules said troll and toxic player's account will be revoked, but how much troll is troll?
body: I sometimes play stuff like ad kassadin and other super off meta stuff, does that count as troll?

replies.body: I say no for the fact that you did nothing wrong because you can play any champ how ever you want. But remember to not act like Tyler1 for the he was toxic and trolled when he didn't his way. as long as you're not like that guy you're good
just to confirm, buying 6 zeals counts as troll while going tear+trinity force+RoA+dead man's doesn't, correct?
it's more about how you build the champ during the whole game.  If I see you with 6 zeals 20 mins in to me it says that you gave up.
I can't speak for the reds, but... as long as you're a good sport, I _think_ you should be fine.
Playing non-meta or unusual tactics is allowed. Playing, for example, AP Olaf, is straight up troll. Being toxic is never allowed.
